overview: Sex won't wait in these four tales of immediate need. Nikki is too turned on to stop when an unexpected guest arrives downstairs in Quiet. Alexia is a pampered singer who can't help herself when she recognizes the tattoo of a pornstar she's seen in Throat. Newcomer Dubsie makes a game of cornering married men in the neighborhood in The Neighbor's Daughter. And finally, Ashleigh works herself up on the memory of hookups past as she waits for her partner to return in Fuck Me Now. Each woman's demands are enthusiastically met in the moment.
title: Fuck Me Now
